If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See ":"0x6408501fa3126ca03ff19960a3c95e504b588e5dd5b621a6f08b6b0687dc96e6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://499fefe9f83b916bdb9f852d9329ac9fad7f7c0c18c81f7a7386c8b3418148f3","dweb:/ipfs/QmeaQ4fgMMXxArCFj7UYxuXkb84DkDGGWmBtuyDqXLDrwd"]}},"version":1}

params._poolKey: The PoolKey structure defining the pool parameters

params._initialBankCapInUsd: Maximum total value the bank can hold (8 decimals)

params._minUsdcOut: The minimum USDC expected from swap (slippage protection)
params._tokenAddress: The token to deposit (can be any Uniswap V4 supported token)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

ETH_ADDRESS().notice: A constant to represent native Ether, following the EIP-7528

WETH().notice: Wrapped ETH address on Sepolia testnet

addToken(address,address).notice: Adds a new token to the list of supported assets by providing its price feed.

addTokenPool(address,(address,address,ui.notice: Adds or updates a PoolKey configuration for swapping a token to USDC

balances(address,address).notice: Mapping from token address to user address to the user's balance.

bankCapInUsd().notice: The maximum total value of all assets the bank can hold, in USD with 8 decimals.

constructor.notice: constructor, grant all important roles to admin

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposits ETH or a supported ERC20 token into the bank.

depositArbitraryToken(address,uint256,ui.notice: Deposits any token and converts it to USDC via Uniswap V4

recoverBalance(address,address,uint256).notice: Manually adjusts a user's balance for recovery purposes.

setBankCapInUsd(uint256).notice: Updates the total bank value cap.

tokenPriceFeeds(address).notice: Mapping from a supported token address to its Chainlink price feed address.

tokenToUsdcPools(address).notice: Mapping from token address to its PoolKey configuration for swapping to USDC

totalBankValueInUsd().notice: The current total value of all assets held by the bank, in USD with 8 decimals.

universalRouter().notice: Uniswap V4 Integration - New in V3

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws ETH or a supported ERC20 token from the bank.

withdrawalLimitInUsd().notice: The maximum value a user can withdraw in a single transaction, in USD with 8 decimals.
